target.mrk: 日期範圍控制 - 範例

<source>RUC_DATE_RANGE_CONTROL_EXAMPLE</source><metadata><othermeta content="26338854C46EE75EE10000000A44176D" name="LOIO.FOLDER.IWB_FOLDER_ID"/><othermeta content="HELPX.MODS_REUSE_FIN" name="LOIO.FOLDER.IWB_TECH_NAME"/><othermeta content="GROETECKE" name="LOIO.FOLDER.IWB_RESPONSIBLE"/><othermeta content="MODS_SECONDARY" name="LOIO.FOLDER.IWB_FOLDER_GROUP"/><othermeta content="" name="LOIO.FOLDER.IWB_SHH_KEY"/><othermeta content="" name="LOIO.FOLDER.IWB_TRANSLATION_MEMORY"/><othermeta content="FI" name="LOIO.FOLDER.TERM_DOMAIN"/><othermeta content="DTA_RC" name="LOIO.IWB_TYPE"/><othermeta content="PAHLER" name="LOIO.IWB_RESPONSIBLE"/><othermeta content="" name="LOIO.IWB_SHH_KEY"/><othermeta content="" name="xray_context"/><othermeta content="" name="xray_page_url"/><othermeta content="" name="xray_system"/><othermeta content="" name="xray_tour_alias"/><othermeta content="" name="xray_environment"/><othermeta content="" name="LOIO.KW_CONVREF.CLASS"/><othermeta content="" name="LOIO.KW_CONVREF.OBJID"/><othermeta content="CLOUDSUITE" name="PHIO.IWB_INDUSTRY"/><othermeta content="400" name="PHIO.RELEASE"/><othermeta content="20160801101843" name="PHIO.CREATED_AT"/><othermeta content="PAHLER" name="PHIO.CREATED_BY"/><othermeta content="20160801101843" name="PHIO.LAST_CHANGED_AT"/><othermeta content="PAHLER" name="PHIO.LAST_CHANGED_BY"/><othermeta content="" name="PHIO.IWB_LEVEL"/></metadata>
You want to choose a date range from October 1 to October 15.

seg-source.mrk: You want to choose a date range from October 1 to October 15.

target.mrk: 您想要選擇一個從 10 月 1 日到 10 月 15 日的日期範圍。

trans-unit.source: You choose <uicontrol>Date Range</uicontrol> from the dropdown list in the first field, click the calendar symbol in the second field and pick the dates (October 1, October 15) from the calendar to define the date range for the line items.

seg-source.mrk: You choose <uicontrol>Date Range</uicontrol> from the dropdown list in the first field, click the calendar symbol in the second field and pick the dates (October 1, October 15) from the calendar to define the date range for the line items.

target.mrk: 您可以從第一個欄位的下拉式清單中選擇 <uicontrol>[日期範圍]</uicontrol>、按一下第二個欄位中的行事曆符號，然後從行事曆中挑選日期 (10 月 1 日、10 月 15 日)，以定義明細項目的日期範圍。

trans-unit.source: You want to see all line items since June 1.

seg-source.mrk: You want to see all line items since June 1.

target.mrk: 您想要查看自 6 月 1 日起的所有明細項目。

trans-unit.source: You choose <uicontrol>From</uicontrol> in the first field and pick June 1 from the calendar in the second field.

seg-source.mrk: You choose <uicontrol>From</uicontrol> in the first field and pick June 1 from the calendar in the second field.

target.mrk: 您可以選擇第一個欄位中的 <uicontrol>[從]</uicontrol>，然後從第二個欄位的行事曆中挑選 6 月 1 日。

trans-unit.source: You want to see all line items with the date in the last ten days.

seg-source.mrk: You want to see all line items with the date in the last ten days.

target.mrk: 您想要查看過去十天內含日期的所有明細項目。

trans-unit.source: You choose <uicontrol>Last X Days</uicontrol> from the dropdown list in the first field and enter <userinput>10</userinput> into the second field.

seg-source.mrk: You choose <uicontrol>Last X Days</uicontrol> from the dropdown list in the first field and enter <userinput>10</userinput> into the second field.

target.mrk: 您可以從第一個欄位的下拉式清單中選擇 <uicontrol>[過去 X 天]</uicontrol>，然後將 <userinput>10</userinput> 輸入第二個欄位。
